news_header: A study shows that AI-enhanced smiles during video chats can increase romantic attraction.
news_text: A recent study published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences reveals that subtle enhancements to smiles during video speed-dating can significantly influence romantic attraction. Researchers found that when both participants had their smiles artificially enhanced, they reported higher levels of attraction. This raises ethical questions about the use of face-altering technology in social interactions, as the effects of such digital manipulations on human psychology are still largely unknown.
